basics.summary:
I am a Computer Scientist studend working as Back-end Developer.
I love JavaScript, Linux, Open Source, Bash, Bitcoin and creating twitter bots.

work.summary: Working with NodeJS and React (with redux), I built high scalable products in an microservices architecture.
highlights: Integration - we rewrite the service separating it in an API and workers, using Google Pub-Sub (an RabbitMQ like service)
Networks - an API rebuild of one of their products, implementing 100% coverage of unit tests and optimizing pain points
Search - an service with focus on search all thing in our system. I worked mostly at the front using React and Redux

work.summary: At PrinciWeb I build Web Systems, Apps and Websites with tons of different tecnologies. (mostly, with NodeJS and C#)
highlights: Robo Tope - Our partly open source robot to automate jobs at the company
NFe - Um Gerador de Nota Fiscal Eletronica. Build with PHP and MySQL (100%, all backend).
Imuneasy - A web system for Immunization Clinics management. Build with NodeJS, CoffeeScript, Express, MsSql.
Stylist - Android app to share photos of fashion looks with friends. Builded with C#, WebApi, Entity Framework, Ionic.
